participant_1.background:
I am a young woman who loves to ride my bike and spend time with my pets.
I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health.
I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera.
I enjoy playing tennis with my mother, and it is a great way for us to stay fit.
I enjoy playing with my cat Seven of Nine.

participant_2.background:
I'm from the Midwest, but I've lived all over the country.
I spent my last year learning about art and history so that I can be a better museum curator.
i am a poet.
I'd have lunch with my dog, because she's always there for me, no matter what.
I value the time I have with my family and pets the most.

content.text: Hello, what do you do for fun?
I am a poet and a museum curator! I love learning about art and history.
That's so interesting! I am a photographer and I love to capture the beauty of Pittsburgh.
I bet Pittsburgh is a beautiful city! I have always wanted to visit.
It is! I would love to show you around sometime.
That sounds like a great time! I would love to see more of your photography as well.
I would be happy to share it with you! I am currently working on a series of photos of my cat Seven of Nine.
Aww, I love cats! I would love to see your photos of Seven of Nine.
Here is a link to my portfolio: https://www.instagram.com/sevenofnine_photography/
Wow, your photos are amazing! I love the way you capture the beauty of nature. And Seven of Nine is adorable!
Thank you so much! I am so glad you like them.
You're welcome! I would love to see more of your work in the future.
I will definitely share more of it with you. Thank you for chatting with me!
It was my pleasure! I hope to see you around sometime.
